comment: Obsolete version of ~ eldifsnneq as of 1-Jun-2023. An element of a difference with a singleton is not equal to the element of that singleton. Note that ` ( -. A e. { C } -> -. A = C ) ` need not hold if ` A ` is a proper class. (Contributed by BJ, 18-Mar-2023.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
